mapper.sql:
t_house_user_asset . id , t_house_user_asset.user_id AS userId, t_house_user_asset.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_user_asset.trust AS trust, t_house_user_asset.create_time AS createTime, t_house_user_asset.note AS note, t_house_user_asset.final_flag AS finalFlag,
t_house_asset.house_number AS roomNumber, t_house_asset.floor AS floor,
t_house_property_community.id AS communityId, t_house_property_community.community As communityName, t_house_property_community.address AS address,
t_house_property_building.id As buildingId, t_house_property_building.area AS buildingArea, t_house_property_building.code AS buildingCode, t_house_property_building.issue AS issue, t_house_property_building_unit.id AS unitId, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction,
t_house_design_model.area AS unitArea, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType, t_house_design_model.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture,
t_house_vr_picture.link AS vrLink, t_house_vr_picture.snapshot AS vrSnapshot,
t_end_user.name AS userName, t_end_user.phone AS userPhone, t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar, t_end_user.real_name AS realName
mapper.select:
SELECT t_house_user_asset.*, t_house_property_community.id AS communityId, t_house_property_community.community As communityName, t_house_property_community.address AS address,
t_house_property_building.id As buildingId, t_house_property_building.area AS buildingArea, t_house_property_building.code AS buildingCode,
t_house_property_building_unit.id AS unitId, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction,
t_house_design_model.area AS unitArea, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType, t_house_design_model.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture, t_house_vr_picture.link AS vrLink, t_house_vr_picture.snapshot AS vrSnapshot,
t_house_asset.house_number AS roomNumber, t_house_asset.floor AS floor,
t_end_user.name AS userName, t_end_user.phone AS userPhone, t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar, t_end_user.real_name AS realName
FROM t_house_user_asset JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_asset.id = t_house_user_asset.asset_id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id = t_house_property_building.community_id JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.id = t_house_asset.unit_id left JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id = t_house_design_model.id left join t_house_vr_picture on t_house_vr_picture.id = t_house_design_model.vr_id JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_user_asset.user_id WHERE t_house_user_asset.id = #{id} GROUP BY t_house_user_asset.id

SELECT
FROM t_house_user_asset
JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_asset.id = t_house_user_asset.asset_id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id=t_house_property_building.community_id left JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.id = t_house_asset.unit_id left JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id=t_house_design_model.id left join t_house_vr_picture on t_house_vr_picture.id = t_house_design_model.vr_id JOIN t_end_user ON t_end_user.id = t_house_user_asset.user_id
where t_house_property_community.id = #{communityId}
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_user_asset.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_property_community.tenant_id = #{record.orgId}
AND t_house_user_asset.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.username},'%')
AND t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userPhone},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_user_asset.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
AND t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingCode},'%')
AND t_house_asset.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.roomNumber},'%')
AND ( t_house_property_community.community LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_design_model.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_asset.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') Or t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search },'%') OR t_end_user.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search },'%') )
ORDER BY t_house_user_asset.user_id
mapper.sql: t_end_user . id AS userId, t_end_user.phone AS userPhone, t_end_user.avatar AS userAvatar, t_end_user.`name` AS userName
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_end_user JOIN t_house_user_asset ON t_end_user.id=t_house_user_asset.user_id
WHERE 1=1
AND t_house_user_asset.id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.id},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.user_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.asset_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.assetId},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.note LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.note},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.create_time LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.createTime},'%')
AND t_house_user_asset.start_time >= DATE(#{startTime})
AND t_house_user_asset.end_time <= DATE(#{endTime}
and t_end_user.org_id=#{orgId}
AND ( t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') )
group by t_house_user_asset.user_id

SELECT t_house_user_tag.id , t_house_user_tag.tag_name AS tagName FROM t_house_user_tag_relate JOIN t_house_user_tag ON t_house_user_tag_relate.tag_id = t_house_user_tag.id WHERE t_house_user_tag_relate.user_id=#{userId}

SELECT t_house_user_note.id, t_house_user_note.note, t_house_user_note.create_time AS createTime, t_house_user_note.note_time AS noteTime FROM t_house_user_note WHERE t_house_user_note.user_id=#{userId} ORDER BY t_house_user_note.create_time desc

select
FROM t_end_user LEFT JOIN t_house_user_asset ON t_house_user_asset.user_id = t_end_user.id WHERE t_end_user.union_id="House" AND t_end_user.appid = "1" AND t_end_user.org_id IS NULL
AND ( t_end_user.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.userPhone},'%') OR t_end_user.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.username},'%') )
mapper.sql:
t_house_user_asset.id , t_house_user_asset.user_id AS userId, t_house_user_asset.asset_id AS assetId, t_house_user_asset.trust AS trust, t_house_user_asset.create_time AS createTime, t_house_user_asset.note AS note, t_house_user_asset.final_flag AS finalFlag,
t_house_asset.house_number AS roomNumber, t_house_asset.floor AS floor,
t_house_property_community.id AS communityId, t_house_property_community.community As communityName, t_house_property_community.address AS address,
t_house_property_building.id As buildingId, t_house_property_building.area AS buildingArea, t_house_property_building.code AS buildingCode, t_house_property_building_unit.id AS unitId, t_house_property_building_unit.direction AS direction,
t_house_design_model.area AS unitArea, t_house_design_model.house_type AS houseType, t_house_design_model.house_type_picture AS houseTypePicture,
user1.name AS userName, user1.phone AS userPhone, user1.avatar AS userAvatar, user1.real_name AS realName,
user2.name AS serverName
mapper.select:
select
FROM t_house_user_asset JOIN t_house_asset ON t_house_asset.id = t_house_user_asset.asset_id JOIN t_house_property_building ON t_house_property_building.id = t_house_asset.building_id JOIN t_house_property_community ON t_house_property_community.id=t_house_property_building.community_id left JOIN t_house_property_building_unit ON t_house_property_building_unit.id = t_house_asset.unit_id left JOIN t_house_design_model ON t_house_property_building_unit.design_model_id=t_house_design_model.id JOIN t_end_user As user1 ON user1.id = t_house_user_asset.user_id LEFT JOIN t_house_rent_asset ON t_house_user_asset.asset_id = t_house_rent_asset.asset_id LEFT JOIN t_end_user AS user2 ON user2.id = t_house_rent_asset.server_id
where 1=1
AND t_house_user_asset.user_id = #{record.userId}
AND t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.buildingCode},'%')
AND t_house_asset.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{record.roomNumber},'%')
AND ( t_house_property_community.community LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_property_building.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_design_model.house_type LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR t_house_asset.house_number LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') Or user1.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search},'%') OR user1.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search },'%') OR user1.real_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search },'%') OR user2.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{search },'%') )
ORDER BY IF(ISNULL(t_house_rent_asset.`status`),2,
IF(t_house_rent_asset.`status`=3,4, IF(t_house_rent_asset.server_id IS NOT NULL,3,IF(t_house_rent_asset.`status`=1,1,1) )))
